ud3.3:1.4: The narrative employs a unique scheme in introducing the repetitions: tedha, tete, teme.
ud3.3:8.3: Here the Buddha invents the concept of “faint praise”.
ud3.3:15.2: Ānandajoti has “about them” for te here, but in parallel phrases we find no, so this must be the second person singular pronoun.
